XXabhisdhu:1_0: The present text is edited to facilitate word-searches. The text is based on the
XXabhisdhu:1_1: manuscript of the transliteration of the AbhisamAcArika-Dharma of the MahAsAGghika-LokottaravAdins.
XXabhisdhu:1_2: Grammatical errors and the like have been left uncorrected,
XXabhisdhu:2: but preferred readings are occasionally given for conspicuous scribal errors.
XXabhisdhu:3: The symbols and editorial features are as follows:
XXabhisdhu:4: (1) The letters between ( ) indicate that they should be supplied.
XXabhisdhu:6: The letters which seem to be wrongly written are underlined. Immediately after them suggestion is supplied between ( ).
XXabhisdhu:8: Letters in blue and underlined are to be omitted. No suggestion is supplied after them. This applies to the omission of the virAma.
XXabhisdhu:9: (4) The letters between [ ] indicate that they are obscure.
XXabhisdhu:10: (5) An illegible character (akXaras) is indicated by one "+".
XXabhisdhu:11: (6) Symbols which seem to indicate virama are substituted by comma (" , ").
XXabhisdhu:12: (7) Symbols which seem to be SiddhaM, etc., are substituted by " * ".
XXabhisdhu:13: (8) Cancellations in the Ms. are not indicated.
XXabhisdhu:14: (9) J. refers to the Jinananda edition.
XXabhisdhu:15: (10) Compounds in which hiatus appears are hyphened.

XXabhisdhu:203: gomayakārṣī dātavyā āsanaprajñaptiḥ karttavyā / vibhavo bhavati śalākā
XXabhisdhu:204: gandhodakena dhovitavyā / puṣpe(3b6)hi okiritavyā / saṃghasthaviro na
XXabhisdhu:205: pratibalo bhavati / dvitīyasthaviro na pratibalo bhavati / yo tatra pratibalo
XXabhisdhu:206: bhavati / tena jānitavyaṃ / ko śalākāṃ cārayiṣyati / ko śalākāṃ
XXabhisdhu:207: praticchiṣyati / ko prātimokṣasūtram uddiśiṣyati / ko dakṣiṇāṃ
XXabhisdhu:208: ādiśiṣyati / ko parikathāṃ kariṣyati / yadi tāvat pratibalo bhavati ātmanā
XXabhisdhu:209: sarvvaṃ karttavyaṃ / atha dāni na pratibalo bhavati / yo tatra prati(3b7)balo
XXabhisdhu:210: bhavati / so adhyeṣitavyo tvaṃ śalākāṃ (J.11) cārayesi tvaṃ śalākāṃ
XXabhisdhu:211: praticchesi tvaṃ prātimokṣaṃ uddiśesi tvaṃ bhāṣesi tvaṃ dakṣiṇāṃ ādiśeṣi
XXabhisdhu:212: tvaṃ parikathāṃ kārayesi / śalākāṃ pi ca cārayantena na kṣamati /
XXabhisdhu:213: anirmmāditakehi hastehi upānahārūḍhena oguṇṭhi(kākṛ)tena vā śalākāṃ
XXabhisdhu:215: atha khalu hastāṃ nirmmādiya upānahāṃ omuñciya ekāṃśakṛtena śalākā
XXabhisdhu:216: cārayitavyā (4a1) śalākāṃ pi dāni praticchantena na kṣamati /
XXabhisdhu:217: anirmmāditakehi hastehi upānahārūḍhena vā oguṇṭhikākṛtena vā
XXabhisdhu:218: śalākāṃ praticchituṃ // atha khalu hastāṃ nirmmādiyāṇa upānahāṃ
XXabhisdhu:219: muñciya ekaṃśakṛtena śalākā praticchitavyā / yaṃ kālaṃ śalākā cāritā
XXabhisdhu:220: bhavanti / bhikṣū gaṇitā bhavanti / sāmagrī ārocitā bhavati /
XXabhisdhu:221: dāyakadānapati pṛcchitavyāḥ ḥ / kim vaśiṣyatha atha (4a2) gacchatha / yadi
XXabhisdhu:222: tāva jalpanti / gacchāma nti(tti) deyadharmma pratiṣṭhāpayitavyo /
XXabhisdhu:225: (I.p.50) athedāniṃ jalpanti vasiṣyāma nti(tti) / vaktavyaṃ / bāhyato tāva
XXabhisdhu:226: yūyaṃ muhūrttam āgametha saṃgho tāva poṣadhaṃ kariṣyati / yaṃ kālaṃ
XXabhisdhu:228: jānitavyaṃ / yadi tāva nātiśītaṃ bhavati nātyūṣṇam vā corabhayam vā na
XXabhisdhu:229: bhavati siṃhabhayaṃ vā vyāghrabhayaṃ vā na (J.12) bhavati / na dūradūre
XXabhisdhu:230: vā pariveṇā bhavanti bhikṣū vā na jarādurbbalā vā vyādhidurbbalā
XXabhisdhu:231: bhavanti / sukhopaviṣṭā bhavanti vistareṇa śrotukāmā bhavanti / tato
XXabhisdhu:232: vistareṇa prātimokṣasūtraṃ uddiśitavyaṃ / atha dāni sarvvarātrikā bhavati /
XXabhisdhu:233: bhāṣaṇakā (4a4) adhyeṣitavyāḥ / tvayā bhāṣitavyaṃ tvayā bhāṣitavyan ti //
XXabhisdhu:235: vvītināmiyāna dāyakadānapati dharmyā kathayā saṃdarśayitavyā yāva
XXabhisdhu:236: udyojayitavyā / tato yathāsukhaṃ karttavyaṃ / abhipramodatu āyuṣmanto
XXabhisdhu:237: apramādena saṃpādayitavyaṃ / evaṃ sarvvehi poṣadhe pratipadyitavyaṃ na
XXabhisdhu:240: bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyāṇāñ ca
XXabhisdhu:241: vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā saṃghasya dāni bāhirakaṃ bhaktaṃ āyuṣmān
XXabhisdhu:242: nandano saṃghasthaviro dvitīyasthaviro upanandano āgato bhikṣū āgatāḥ /
XXabhisdhu:243: saṃghasthaviro nāgacchāti / odano śītalo bhavati / sūpo śītalo bhavati /
XXabhisdhu:244: ghṛtaṃ thīyati māṃsaṃ thīyati vyañjanāni śītalī(4a6)bhavanti /
XXabhisdhu:245: dāyakadānapati pṛcchanti / ārya kiṃ samagro bhikṣusaṃgho āhaṃsu
XXabhisdhu:246: nohedaṃ dīrghāyu ko khu nāgacchati / āhaṃsu saṃghasthaviro nāgacchati /
XXabhisdhu:247: te dāni ojjhāyanti / vayaṃ yeca(va) tāva karmmāntāṃ cchoriya
XXabhisdhu:249: saṃghasthaviro pi nāgacchati / (J.13) so dāni paścād āgacchiyāṇa
XXabhisdhu:250: bhuṃjiyāṇa saṃkṣiptena dakṣiṇām ādiśiya na parikathāṃ (4a7) karoti /
XXabhisdhu:252: samādāpayati / samuttejayati / saṃpraharṣayati / utthihi(ya) gato navakā
XXabhisdhu:253: bhikṣū pṛcchanti / āgato saṃghasthaviro āhaṃsu āgato ca gato ca te dāni
XXabhisdhu:254: odhyāyati naiva saṃghasthavirasya āgatir (na) ggatiḥ prajñāyati / etaṃ
XXabhisdhu:255: prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣū bhagavato ārocayeṃsu / bhagavān aha / śabdāpayatha
XXabhisdhu:256: nandanaṃ / so (4b1) dāni śabdāvito bhagavān āha / satyaṃ nandana evan
XXabhisdhu:257: nāma saṃghasya bāhirakaṃ bhaktaṃ (nandano) saṃghasthaviro upanandano
XXabhisdhu:258: dvitīyasthaviro ti tad eva sarvvaṃ bhagavān vistareṇa pratyārocayati / yāva
XXabhisdhu:259: navakā bhikṣū odhyāyanti / yāva saṃghasthavirasyāgatir nna gati
XXabhisdhu:261: bhagavān āha / tena hi saṃghasthavireṇa evaṃ bhaktāgre pratipadyitavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:262: kin ti dāni saṃghasthavire(4b2)ṇa evaṃ bhaktāgre pratipadyitavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:263: saṃghasthavireṇa jānitavyaṃ / kasyādya bhaktaṃ ubhayato sāṃghikaṃ
XXabhisdhu:264: sarvvaṃ sāṃghikaṃ pariveṇikaṃ / pāṭiyabhaktaṃ grāme vihāre eṣo dāni
XXabhisdhu:265: koci saṃghaṃ bhaktena śuvetanāya nimantreti / na dāni saṃghasthavireṇa
XXabhisdhu:266: gatāgatasya adhivāsayitavyaṃ / atha khalu saṃghasthavireṇa jānitavyaṃ ko
XXabhisdhu:267: yaṃ nimantreti / āgantuko gamiko gṛhastho pravrajito strī puruṣo
XXabhisdhu:268: dā(4b3)rako dārikā pṛcchitavyaṃ / kin nāmako si (J.14) kiṅ gotrako si / kiṃ
XXabhisdhu:269: karmmikā te mātāpitarau katamaṃ deśaṃ gṛhaṃ katamāyāṃ rathyāyāṃ
XXabhisdhu:270: kuto mukhaṃ gṛhasya vā sākāraṃ soddeśaṃ pṛcchiyāṇaṃ tato
XXabhisdhu:271: dhivāsayitavyaṃ / nāpi dāni adhivāsita(ṃ) mayeti / yatrollagnāye āsitavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:272: atha khalu prakṛtyeva māsacāriko pakṣacāriko vā preṣayitavyo gaccha
XXabhisdhu:273: jānā(4b4)hi kiṃ sajjiyatīti / anekāya tahi jātakaṃ bhaveyaṃ mṛtakam vā
XXabhisdhu:274: bhaveya sandhi vā cchinno agnidāho vā rājakulāto vā upadravo ḍhossā vā
XXabhisdhu:275: viṭā vā vātaputro vā viheṭhanābhiprāyā nimantrayeṃsu tena gacchiya
XXabhisdhu:276: pṛcchitavyaṃ / koci imaṃhi itthannāmo nāma upāsako yadi tāva āhaṃsu
XXabhisdhu:277: nāsti asmākaṃ koci evaṃ nāma upāsako vaktavyaṃ [bhi]kṣu(4b5)saṃgho tena
XXabhisdhu:278: nimantrito kiṃ sidhyati vā pacyati vā / yadi tāva āhaṃsu kasya bhaktaṃ
XXabhisdhu:279: kasya sidhyati kasya pacyatīti jānitavyaṃ / vipralabdho bhikṣusaṃgho ti
XXabhisdhu:280: (I.p.52) āgacchiya yadi tāva anugraho bhavati anugraho sādhayitavyo /
XXabhisdhu:281: anugraho na bhavati bhaktāni bhavanti / bhaktāni uddiśitavyāni / bhaktāni
XXabhisdhu:282: na bhavanti raṇaraṇā(ya) gaṇḍi āhaṇiya vaktavyaṃ / āyu(4b6)ṣman
XXabhisdhu:283: vipralabdho bhikṣusaṃgho svakasvakāṃ vṛttiṃ paryeṣatha / sarvvehi
XXabhisdhu:284: paṭipāṭikāya piṇḍāya praviśitavyaṃ / atha dāni te jalpanti / bhante etaṃ
XXabhisdhu:285: sidhyati praviśati(tu) bhikṣusaṃgho ti tato raṇaraṇāya gaṇḍī āhaṇiya yadi
XXabhisdhu:286: tāva hemanto bhavati anukālaṃ (J.15) praviśitavyaṃ / mā kālo
XXabhisdhu:287: tikrayi(mi)ṣyatīti / atha dāni grīṣmo kālo bhavati śītalakasaṃgena
XXabhisdhu:289: atha (4b7) dāni varṣārātro kālo bhavati devāntarāyena anukālyaṃ
XXabhisdhu:290: praviśitavyaṃ / mā kālo atikramiṣyatīti / yadi tāva (na) saṃjña(jja)m
XXabhisdhu:291: bhavati / mahanto ca kālo bhavati kahiñci ca gantukāmo bhavati / kasyacita
XXabhisdhu:292: bhikṣusya jalpitavyaṃ / amukaṃ kulaṃ upasaṃkramiṣyatha yadā sajjaṃ
XXabhisdhu:293: bhaveya / tato mā paṭisaresi / na dāni tena āmantritaṃ mayā ti
XXabhisdhu:294: bhadrapālakṛtyehi haṇṭhitavyaṃ / atha khalu prati(5a1)kṛtyeva āgantavyaṃ
XXabhisdhu:295: praviśatehi jānitavyaṃ / kathaṃ āsanā prajñaptāḥ / atidakṣiṇam anuvāmāṃ
XXabhisdhu:296: kadāci maṅgalakaraṇīye atidakṣiṇaṃ prajñaptaṃ bhavati / tathā yeva
XXabhisdhu:297: upaveṣṭavyaṃ / atha dāni pretakaraṇīye anuvāmaṃ prajñaptaṃ bhavati /
XXabhisdhu:298: tathā yeva upaveṣṭavyaṃ nāpi dāni kṣamati / praviśantehi bhaṇḍaṃ
XXabhisdhu:300: gantuṃ / atha khalu bhaṇḍaṃ pa(5a2)rivarjantehi kāṃsabhājanaṃ
XXabhisdhu:301: parivarjantehi dārakadārikāṃsa parivarjantehi praviśitavyaṃ / nāpi dāni
XXabhisdhu:302: kṣamati gatāgatasya upaviśanta(tu)ṃ / atha khalu hastena āsanaṃ
XXabhisdhu:303: pratyavekṣitavyaṃ / anaikāyo tatra garbharūpāṇi sopāyitakāni bhaveṃsuḥ /
XXabhisdhu:304: kāṃsabhājanāni vā thapitakāni bhaveṃsuḥ / atha khalu hastena
XXabhisdhu:306: pratikṛtye(5a3)va dāpitavyaṃ / atha dāni so manuṣyo anācīrṇṇadāno vā
XXabhisdhu:307: bhavati / tittino vā bhavati na dāni adhyupekṣitavyaṃ / vaktavyaṃ dīrghāyu
XXabhisdhu:308: avaśyan teṣāṃ dātavyaṃ piṇḍapātaṃ (I.p.53) / atha dāni dāyakadānapati
XXabhisdhu:309: jalpanti paṭipāṭikāya gṛhnatha nti(tti) hemanto ca kālo bhavati vaktavyaṃ
XXabhisdhu:310: nahi nti(tti) / bhagavatā anekaparyāyeṇa glāno paritto kim vā ambhehi
XXabhisdhu:311: vihāraśū(5a4)nyaṃ śakyaṃ karttuṃ ti laghu kālo atikramati / detha yūyan ti
XXabhisdhu:312: atha dāni grīṣmo vā varṣā vā rātro vā kālo bhavati cirehi kālo
XXabhisdhu:313: atikramati / paṭipāṭikāya gṛhnitavyaṃ / tato saṃghasthavireṇa jānitavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:314: kiṃ ārabhya deti tathā yeca(va) nimantraṇāpetavyaṃ bhojanaṃ dīyati
XXabhisdhu:315: mahanto piṇḍo parigṛhīto bhavati / saṃghasthavireṇa vaktavyaṃ / sarvveṣāṃ
XXabhisdhu:316: etta(5a5)ka-ettakaṃ bhaviṣyati / āha / nahi āryasya etaṃ evaṃ dīyati
XXabhisdhu:317: vaktavyaṃ / tathā dehi / yathā sarvveṣāṃ samaṃ bhavati / atha dān āha
XXabhisdhu:318: bhaviṣyatīti pratīcchitavyaṃ / atha dāni so thokinā arthiko bhavati
XXabhisdhu:319: vaktavyaṃ mama thokaṃ dehi heṣṭhā bahuṃ evaṃ // pe // sūpasya ghṛtasya
XXabhisdhu:320: māṃsasya olaṃkānāṃ dadhisya tato nāpi kṣamati saṃghasthavireṇa labdho
XXabhisdhu:321: piṇḍo (5a6) dvāraṃ paśyiya lapyala(p)yāye bhuṃjiyāṇa utthihiya gantuṃ /
XXabhisdhu:322: atha khalu odanasampattir vvā āgamaṃtena bhuṃjitavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:323: vyañjanasampattir vvā āgamaṃtena bhuñjitavyaṃ na bhuñjitvā hastaṃ
XXabhisdhu:324: nikṣipiya āsitavyaṃ / mā heva otrapeṃsu / atha khalu anujānetavyaṃ / yadā
XXabhisdhu:325: navakāḥ santarpitā bhavanti / upagrāyanti pānīyaṃ vā pibanti / hastām vā
XXabhisdhu:326: ukkaḍhḍhiya āsanti / na dāni saṃghasthavireṇa bhuñja(5a7)ntakenaiva
XXabhisdhu:327: utthāya āsanāto gantavyaṃ / labdho piṇḍo dvāraṃ paśyiya / atha khalu
XXabhisdhu:329: karttavyā / dakṣiṇā ādisitavyā / jānitavyaṃ / kim ālambanaṃ bhaktaṃ
XXabhisdhu:330: jātakaṃ mṛtakam vā ce(ve)vāhikam vā gṛhapraveśakam vā āgantukasya
XXabhisdhu:332: yadi tāva jāna(ta)kaṃbhavati / nāyaṃ dakṣiṇā ādi(śi)ta(5b1)vyā /
XXabhisdhu:340: buddhaṃ vipaśyiñ ca śikhi(ñ) ca viśvabhuṃ
XXabhisdhu:345: tā naṃ rakṣaṃtu tā ca naṃ pālayantu
XXabhisdhu:346: yathā naṃ icchati mātā yathā naṃ icchati pitā
XXabhisdhu:349: atha dāni mṛtakaṃ bhavati / nāyaṃ kṣamati / evaṃ dakṣiṇā ādiśituṃ
XXabhisdhu:359: apare mārggam bhāvayitvā parinirvvānti anāśravā iti //
XXabhisdhu:361: atha dāni vedā(vā)hikaṃ bhavati / nā(5b4)yaṃ dakṣiṇā ādiśitavyā /
XXabhisdhu:362: nagnā nadī anodikā nagnaṃ rāṣṭraṃ arājakaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:363: istrī pi vidhavā nagnā sacesyā daśa bhrātaro
XXabhisdhu:366: istri pi peśalā bhavatu śrāddhā bhavatu pativratānugā
XXabhisdhu:367: śīlavatī yo(tyā)gasampannā samyagdṛṣṭi ca yā iha /
XXabhisdhu:368: puruṣo pi peśalā bhavatu śrāddho bhavatu vratā(5b5)nugo /
XXabhisdhu:369: śīlavāṃ tyāgasampanno samyagdṛṣṭi ca yo iha //
XXabhisdhu:370: ubhau śraddhāya sampannā ubhau śīlo(le)hi saṃvṛtā /
XXabhisdhu:373: tām eva bhāryāṃ careyā yo asyā sīlehi saṃvṛtā //
XXabhisdhu:376: atha dā(5b6)ni gharapraveśanikaṃ bhavati / nāyaṃ dakṣiṇā ādiśitavyā /
XXabhisdhu:377: (J.21) ādīptasmiṃ āgare yo niharati bhaṇḍakaṃ taṃ
XXabhisdhu:378: khu tasya svakaṃ bhavati / na khalu yo tatra dahyati /
XXabhisdhu:379: evam ādīpite loke mṛtyunā ca jarayā ca
XXabhisdhu:380: yo nīharati / dānena dinnaṃ taṃ āhuti hutaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:390: bhūr ime ca sā yasmiṃ pradeśe
XXabhisdhu:393: (J.22) yā tatra devatā asyā tāsāṃ dakṣiṇām ādiśehi /
XXabhisdhu:396: grāme vā yadi vāraṇye nimne vā yadi vā sthale
XXabhisdhu:397: divā vā yadi vā rātrau devā rakṣantu dāyakān //
XXabhisdhu:400: atha dāni gamikaṃ bhaktaṃ bhavati / nāyaṃ dakṣinā ādiśitavyā /
XXabhisdhu:406: atha khalu diśā sauvastikā dakṣiṇā vistareṇa dakṣiṇā ādiśitavyā /
XXabhisdhu:408: atha dāni pravrajitasya bhavati / nāyaṃ dakṣiṇā ādiśitavyā
XXabhisdhu:409: (J.23)putram vā paśum vā ārabhya dhanadhānyapriyāṇi vā
XXabhisdhu:410: (I.p.57) devabhāvaṃ vā manuṣyam vā pañcadho (6a3) manasi prīyanti /
XXabhisdhu:413: suduṣkaraṃ pravrajitasya dānaṃ pātreṇa bhaikṣaṃ abhisāharitvā /
XXabhisdhu:414: kulāt kulaṃ cariya piṇḍapātaṃ kruddhaprasannānāṃ mukhaṃ
XXabhisdhu:416: so yaṃ śreṣṭhāyatane pratiṣṭhito pātrasaṃhṛto lābho prītiṃ janehi
XXabhisdhu:417: suvihitā tathā hi dinnaṃ imaṃ dānan ti /
XXabhisdhu:419: evaṃ saṃghasthavireṇa bhaktāgre pratipadyitavyaṃ / na pratipadyati //
XXabhisdhu:422: bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati / śāstā devānāñ ca manuṣyāṇāñ ca /
XXabhisdhu:423: vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā saṃghasya dāni bāhirakaṃ bhaktaṃ / āyuṣmān
XXabhisdhu:425: āga(6a5)to dvitīyasthaviro nāgacchati / dāyakadānapati pṛcchanti / ārya kiṃ
XXabhisdhu:426: samagro bhikṣusaṃgho bhikṣū āhaṃsu / noheti dīrghāyu ko dāni
XXabhisdhu:427: nāgacchati (J.24) āhaṃsu dvitīyasthaviro nāgacchati / te dāni odhyāyanti /
XXabhisdhu:428: paśyatha bhaṇe vayaṃ yeva bhā(tā)va karmmāntāṃ cchoriya āgacchāma
XXabhisdhu:429: samagraṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pariviśiṣyāma / āryamiśrāṇāñ ca pādāṃ
XXabhisdhu:431: odhyāyati / asmākaṃ bhagavāṃ daṇḍakarmman deti / dvitīyasthavirasya
XXabhisdhu:432: munti(tti)kā // etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣū bhagavato ārocayeṃsu / bhagavān
XXabhisdhu:433: āha / śabdāpayatha upanandanaṃ so dāni śabdāpito bhagavān āha / satyaṃ
XXabhisdhu:434: upanandana evaṃ nāma saṃghasya bāhirakaṃ bhaktaṃ nandano
XXabhisdhu:435: saṃghasthaviro tvaṃ dvitīyasthaviro saṃghasthaviro āgato bhi(6a7)kṣū
XXabhisdhu:436: āgatāḥ / tvaṃ nāgacchasi / dāyakadānapati pṛcchati / ārya kiṃ samagro
XXabhisdhu:437: bhikṣusaṃgho bhikṣū āhaṃsu / nahi ko khalu nāgacchati dvitīyasthaviro
XXabhisdhu:438: nāgacchati / te dāni odhyāyanti / vayaṃ (I.p.58) yeva tāva karmmāntaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:439: cchoriya āgatā gacchāmaḥ / samagraṃ bhikṣusaṃghaṃ pariviśiṣyāmaḥ /

XXabhisdhu:3211: cīvaraṃ kaḍḍhantena praviśituṃ yahiṃ lagnaṃ tahi lagnaṃ yahiṃ pāṭitaṃ

XXabhisdhu:3310: uccagghanti āyuṣman snigdho khalu te su(mu)khavarṇṇo pilipilāyanti /
XXabhisdhu:3311: oṣṭhā suṣṭhu khalu (II.p.45) nirddhāpīyati / yathāpi dāni
XXabhisdhu:3312: nagarakulopakena pitṝyakena sārddhaṃ praviṣṭasya ipsitānnāni bhojanāni
XXabhisdhu:3313: bhu(42a4)ktāvisyā so dāni āha / āyuṣman kuto me ipsitānnāni bhojanāni
XXabhisdhu:3314: bhuktāni evaṃ ca evaṃ cāsmi vipralabdho etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣū
XXabhisdhu:3315: bhagavato ārocayeṃsu / bhagavān āha / śabdāpayatha upanandanaṃ so dāni
XXabhisdhu:3316: śabdāpito bhagavān āha / satyaṃ upanandana evaṃ nāma tvaṃ nandanasya
XXabhisdhu:3317: sārvve(rddhe)vihāriṃ jalpasi / ehi āyuṣman (42a5) grāmaṃ praviśiṣyāmaḥ /
XXabhisdhu:3318: ahaṃ ca tatra kiñci akalpiyaṃ adhyācariṣyāmi // mā khalu kasyaci
XXabhisdhu:3319: a(ā)cikṣiṣyasi / ahaṃ khalu te pitṛyako bhavāmi / tad eva (J.191) sarvvaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3320: bhagavān vistareṇa pratyārocayati / yāva so dāni āha / āyuṣman kuto me
XXabhisdhu:3321: ipsitānnāni bhojanāni bhuktāni evaṃ ca evaṃ cāsmi vipralabdho āha / āma
XXabhisdhu:3323: bhaga(42a6)vān āha / duṣkṛtaṃ te upanandana tena hi evaṃ pureśramaṇena
XXabhisdhu:3324: pratipadyitavyaṃ / evaṃ paścācchramaṇena pratipadyitavyaṃ / kin ti dāni
XXabhisdhu:3326: pratipadyitavyaṃ / nāyaṃ tāva kṣamati / bhikṣuṇā paścācchramaṇo
XXabhisdhu:3327: praveśituṃ yo na pratibalo tasya ca ātmano ca vṛttiṃ saṃvibhajituṃ / atha
XXabhisdhu:3328: khalu yo pratibalo tasya ca (42a7) ātmano ca vṛttiṃ saṃvibhajituṃ / tena
XXabhisdhu:3329: paścācchramaṇo praveśayitavyo / eṣo dāni bhikṣu upādhyāyasya vā
XXabhisdhu:3330: ācāryasya vā paścācchramaṇo gacchati / nāpi kṣamati tena dūraṃ
XXabhisdhu:3331: pṛṣṭhato gantuṃ / nāpi kṣamati / khureṇa khuraṃ hanantena / atha khalu
XXabhisdhu:3332: nātyātidūraṃ nātyāsannaṃ gantavyaṃ / tenāpi dāni pureśramaṇena nāpi
XXabhisdhu:3333: kṣamati / ghāḍena yathā oḍḍitāye grī(42b1)vāye gantuṃ / atha khalu
XXabhisdhu:3334: yugamātraṃ nidhyāyantena gantavyaṃ / anekāye bhrānto vā hasti
XXabhisdhu:3335: āgaccheya bhrānto vā aśvo bhrānto vā ratho caṇḍo vā śvāno caṇḍo vā
XXabhisdhu:3336: goṇo (II.p.46) āgaccheya nti(tti) / yadi tāva dakṣiṇenāntenāgacchati /
XXabhisdhu:3338: uccattitavyaṃ / atha dāni duścakṣuko bhavati / jarādurbbalo vā
XXabhisdhu:3339: vyādhidurbbalo vā / (42b2) paścācchramaṇena vaktavyaṃ / upādhyāyo vā
XXabhisdhu:3340: ācāryo vā vāmahastikam vā dakṣiṇahastikaṃ vā uccatta nti(tti) / atha dāni
XXabhisdhu:3341: na paśyati hastena gṛhniyāṇaṃ ekato vā ekato vā uccattayitavyo / eṣo ca
XXabhisdhu:3342: dāni bhikṣusya sārddhevihārī vā ante(J.192)vāsī vā paścācchrava(ma)ṇaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3343: praveśenti / yadi tāva pratibalo bhavati tasya ātmano ca vṛttiṃ
XXabhisdhu:3344: saṃvibhajayituṃ / praveśayitavyo / atha dā(42b3)ni na pratibalo bhavati /
XXabhisdhu:3345: praveśito ca tena bhavati / paścācchramaṇo kālena kālaṃ visarjayitavyo /
XXabhisdhu:3346: tathā karttavyaṃ yathā pratibalo bhavati piṇḍapātam vā aṇṭhituṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3348: atha dāni bhikṣuḥ śirāṃ vindā(ddhā)payitukāmo bhavati / bāhuśirāṃ
XXabhisdhu:3349: vāṅgulyaśirāṃ vā nilāṭiṃ vā yadi tāva pratibalo bhavati /
XXabhisdhu:3350: paścācchramaṇasya (42b4) ātmano ci(vi)ttaṃ saṃvibhajitu(ṃ) vaktavyaṃ / āsa
XXabhisdhu:3351: tvaṃ sahitakāṃ bhuṃjiya nirddhāviṣyāmaḥ / yaṃ kālaṃ śirāviddhā
XXabhisdhu:3352: bhavati / ubhayehi bhuñjiya nirddhāvitavyaṃ / atha dāni na pratibalo
XXabhisdhu:3353: bhavati / kālena kālaṃ visarjayitavyo / vaktavyaṃ suvihita gantavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3354: āgamiṣyaṃ ahaṃ, / yena vā tena sārddhaṃ tenāpi dāni piṇḍacārikaṃ vā
XXabhisdhu:3355: aṇṭhiyāṇa vihāraṃ (42b5) vā gacchiya āhāraṃ kṛtvā / nāpi dāni kṣamati /
XXabhisdhu:3356: dinnā mama ānantikā ti / adarśanena priyaṃ karttuṃ, / atha khalu bhuktaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3357: na bhuktan ti / anyasya haste pātraṃ datvā tahiṃ gantavyaṃ / yadi tāva na
XXabhisdhu:3358: viddhā śirā (II.p.47) bhavati glānasya anu(J.193)kālyaṃ āhāraṃ datvā
XXabhisdhu:3359: sahitakehi nirddhāvitavyā / atha dāni dūragocaro saṃghārāmo bhavati
XXabhisdhu:3361: bhavati / evaṃ pi kariya gantavyaṃ / yadi tāva so śirāviddho eva
XXabhisdhu:3362: nirddhāvati / ayaṃ praviṣṭo bhavati / rathyāntaraṃ vā paśyati / tato yyeva
XXabhisdhu:3363: nivarttayitavyaṃ / nagaradvāre paśyati nagaradvārato nivarttitavyaṃ / panthe
XXabhisdhu:3364: paśyati / panthāto nivarttitavyaṃ / yato eva paśyati / tato eva nivarttitavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3365: atha dāni koci vandati vaktavyaṃ / (42b7) amuko vandati / atha dāni
XXabhisdhu:3366: nimantreti upalakṣitavyaṃ / paścācchramaṇena yato nirggato bhavati / tato
XXabhisdhu:3367: ārocayitavyaṃ / amukena upādhyāyo nimantrito amukena vā antaraghare
XXabhisdhu:3368: bhuṃjati / pureśramaṇo na pratibalo bhavati dakṣiṇām ādiśituṃ, / āhaṃsu /
XXabhisdhu:3369: ādiśa dakṣiṇāṃ na dāni paścācchramaṇena vaktavyaṃ / yathā yeva
XXabhisdhu:3370: agrāsanaṃ agrodakaṃ agrapiṇḍa(43a1)pātaṃ paribhuñjasi tathā yeva
XXabhisdhu:3371: dakṣiṇām ādiśāhi / atha khalu ādiśitavyaṃ paścācchramaṇena / evaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3376: bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati / apareṇa dāni bhikṣuṇā bhikṣu adhyeṣṭā
XXabhisdhu:3377: āyuṣman icchāmi piṇḍapātaṃ nikkāliyamā(43a2)naṃ so dāni āha / ānehi
XXabhisdhu:3378: pātraṃ so dāni bhikṣu piṇḍapātasya kṛtena praviṣṭo ayaṃ pi deśakālaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3379: dantakāṣṭhaṃ gṛhītvā ārāmacārikāṃ caṃcūryati / (J.194) so dāni bhikṣu
XXabhisdhu:3380: piṇḍapātaṃ gṛhnitha / āgato / yāva paśyati so vihārakaṃ ghaṭṭitakaṃ, so
XXabhisdhu:3381: dāni muhūrttakaṃ āgamiyāṇaṃ yadā nāgacchati (II.p.48) vihārakasya
XXabhisdhu:3382: dvāramūle piṇḍapātakaṃ thapiya gato taṃ dāni ā(43a3)ha apareṇa
XXabhisdhu:3383: āgacchiyāṇaṃ utkṣiptaṃ so dāni bhikṣuḥ / vihāram āgatvā āgameti /
XXabhisdhu:3384: idānīṃ pi eṣyati muhūrttaṃ pi eṣyati yāva akālībhūtaṃ te dāni
XXabhisdhu:3385: ka(ga)tyāha(ya)ṃ kālasya ubhaye samāgatā so dāni tasya jalpati /
XXabhisdhu:3386: a(ā)yuṣman sādhu taṃ pātrakaṃ pi labhema / so dāni āha / āyuṣman kasya
XXabhisdhu:3387: pātraṃ kuto pātraṃ so dāni ā(43a4)ha / āyuṣman na tvaṃ māyā adhyeṣṭo
XXabhisdhu:3388: icchāmi piṇḍapātaṃ nikkāliyamānaṃ / so dāni āha / āyuṣman yadā so
XXabhisdhu:3389: mayā piṇḍapātako vihārasya purato nikṣipto / so dāni āha / āyuṣman
XXabhisdhu:3390: evaṃ ca tvaṃ śūnyake vihārake pātraṃ nikṣipiya gacchasi / so dāni āha /
XXabhisdhu:3391: āyuṣman etaṃ ca tvaṃ mama piṇḍapātanīhāra(43a5)kaṃ adhyeṣitvā
XXabhisdhu:3392: adarśanena priyaṃ karesi / te dāni vivaditā / bhagavato mūlaṃ gatāḥ /
XXabhisdhu:3393: bhagavān āha / nāyaṃ tāva kṣamati nīhārikapiṇḍapātena
XXabhisdhu:3394: piṇḍapātanīhārakaṃ adhyeṣitvā adarśanena priyaṃ karttuṃ, / nāpi
XXabhisdhu:3395: kṣamati / piṇḍapātanīhārakena piṇḍapātam ānayitvā śūnyake vihārake
XXabhisdhu:3396: osariya gantuṃ / tena hi evaṃ (43a6) piṇḍapāte(ta)nīhārakena
XXabhisdhu:3398: dāni sarvvasaṃghasya antaraghare nimantraṇam bhavati / bhikṣu
XXabhisdhu:3399: jarādurbbalo vā vyādhidurbbalo vā bhavati / na pratibalo gantuṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3401: piṇḍapātaṃ nikkāliyantaṃ ti vaktavyaṃ / āyuṣman mā kha(43a7)lu
XXabhisdhu:3402: adarśanaṃ gamiṣyasi / tena adhyeṣṭena samānena duve pātrāṇy ādāya
XXabhisdhu:3403: praviśitavyaṃ / yadi tāva hemantakālo bhavati / laghukālo atikramati /
XXabhisdhu:3404: dāyakadānapatī vaktavyāḥ / detha glānasya piṇḍapātaṃ / yadi tāva
XXabhisdhu:3405: dāyakadānapati jalpanti / bhante paṭipāṭikāya gṛhnatha vaktavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3407: lahuṃ ca kālo atikrāmati / yadi tāva denti dve piṇḍapātakā gṛhnitavyā
XXabhisdhu:3408: ātmano ca tasya ca śiktaḍḍitakaṃ kṛtvā vihārakaṃ āgantavyaṃ // atha dāni
XXabhisdhu:3409: grīṣmo vā varṣārātro vā kālo bhavati cireṇa kālo atikramati /
XXabhisdhu:3410: paṭipāṭikāya gṛhnitavyaṃ / śiktaḍḍitakaṃ kṛtvā vihārakaṃ gantavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3411: yadi tāvad yāvadarthaṃ bhaktaṃ dīyati / prakṛtyeva ātmano bhaktato tasya
XXabhisdhu:3412: pātraṃ pūretavyaṃ / (43b2) anubhāgo ātmano gṛhnitavyo / atha dāni so
XXabhisdhu:3413: dāni patitittiṇo bhavati / yattakaṃ dīyati tattakaṃ gṛhnitavyaṃ / na dāni
XXabhisdhu:3414: apratyagraṃ gṛhnitavyaṃ / ekānte yūya(ṣa)ṃ sākavyañjanaṃ vā gṛhnitavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3415: nāpi dāni adhotakehi hastehi aprayatehi gṛhnitavyaṃ / atha khalu (J.196)
XXabhisdhu:3416: prakṣālitvā nirmmādayitvā gṛhnitavyaṃ / atha khalu prakṣālitvā
XXabhisdhu:3417: nirmmādayitvā gṛhnitavyaṃ / yadi uppakkaṭo kālo bhava(43b3)ti / na dāni
XXabhisdhu:3418: tena bhuñjantena āsitavyaṃ / atha khalu ubhaye piṇḍapātā niharttavyā /
XXabhisdhu:3419: tena gacchantena kālo nidhyāpayitavyo yadi jānanti / śakyaṃ sakālena
XXabhisdhu:3420: saṃbhāvayituṃ / gantavyaṃ gacchitvā tasya upanāmetavyaṃ / atha paśyati
XXabhisdhu:3421: upakkhaṭo kālo antāntiko na śakyaṃ sakāle saṃbhāvayituṃ / mā dāni
XXabhisdhu:3422: ubhaye cchinnabhaktā bhaviṣyāma tena (43b4) paribhuñjitavyaṃ / nāpi
XXabhisdhu:3423: kṣamati nīhārapiṇḍapātenāpi adhyeṣṭo mayā piṇḍapātanīhārako ti
XXabhisdhu:3424: adarśanena priyaṃ, karttuṃ / atha khalu prakṛtyeva tāva dantakāṣṭhaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3426: kuṇḍikāṃ paripūriyāṇaṃ vihārasya prahāṇake dve āsanāni prajñapiya
XXabhisdhu:3427: (II.p.50) adhiṣṭhānāṃ pratigrāhāpiya āsitavyaṃ / yaṃ kālaṃ (43b5) āgato
XXabhisdhu:3428: bhavati upaviśiyāṇaṃ sahitakehi bhuṃjitavyaṃ / atha dāni so jalpati /
XXabhisdhu:3429: āyuṣman bhuṃja tvaṃ bhuktaṃ mayeti cchandayitavyo vaktavyo ūnakaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3430: pūrehi yaṃ te rucyati taṃ khādehi yadi tāva ākāṃkṣati / upaviśiyāṇaṃ yaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3431: rucyati taṃ khāditavyaṃ / atha dāni na kāṃkṣitavyaṃ / āyuṣman bhuṃja
XXabhisdhu:3433: atha dāni dūragocaro saṃghārāmo (43b6) bhavati / piṇḍapātanīhārako ca
XXabhisdhu:3434: cireṇa āgacchati kālo ca stokāvaśeṣo bhavati (J.197) nīhārakapiṇḍapātena
XXabhisdhu:3435: hastā nirmmādiyāṇaṃ pānīyasya kuṇḍikāṃ pūriyāṇaṃ panthe
XXabhisdhu:3436: pratyudgacchitavyaṃ / yatra yeva taṃ paśyati / tatra yeva panthāto
XXabhisdhu:3437: uccattiyāṇaṃ sahitakehi bhuñjitavyaṃ / atha dāni nīhārakapiṇḍapāto na
XXabhisdhu:3439: tvaritatvarita(43b7)m āgantavyaṃ / atha dāni dūre saṃghārāmo bhavati
XXabhisdhu:3440: piṇḍapātanīhārakena yatraiva pānīyaṃ paśyati / tatraiva bhuṃjitavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3441: mā dāni vayaṃ ubhayeva bhaktacchedaṃ kariṣyāma evaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3446: bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati / te dāni bhikṣū piṇḍāya ca(44a1)ramāṇo
XXabhisdhu:3447: antaraghare yāva uṭṭhāṇāto nirghoṭenti / jano dāni odhyāyanti /
XXabhisdhu:3448: paśyatha bhaṇe śramaṇakāḥ / yāva uṭṭhāṇāto nirghoṭenti / naṣṭaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3449: bhraṣṭaṃ kuto imeṣāṃ śrāmaṇyaṃ etaṃ prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣū bhagavato
XXabhisdhu:3451: (II.p.51) bhagavān āha / samyag bhikṣavo jano odhyāyati / tena hi evaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3452: piṇḍāye caritavyaṃ / kin ti dāni evaṃ piṇḍāye caritavyaṃ / nāyaṃ tāva
XXabhisdhu:3453: kṣamati piṇḍacārikena yā(44a2)va uṭṭhānāto nirghoṭayituṃ / nāpi
XXabhisdhu:3454: adarśanapathe sthātuṃ, / atha khalu udeśe sthātavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3455: darśanaśravaṇapathe nedāni vaktavyaṃ / piṇḍapātaṃ mahāpuṇye dehi /
XXabhisdhu:3456: atha khalu tūṣṇīkena uddeśe sthātavyaṃ / na dāni ito vā ito vā
XXabhisdhu:3457: nidhyāyantena āsitavyaṃ / mā paśyeṃsu / corā vā ocorakā (J.198)
XXabhisdhu:3458: bhavanti / atha khalu ṣaḍāyatanaṃ manasikarentena sthāta(44a3)vyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3459: cakṣur anityā yāva mano anityan ti sthātavyaṃ / eṣa strī dhānyaṃ ohananti
XXabhisdhu:3460: yadi tāva kaṇḍikāpūrakam ukkaḍḍhiya occarakaṃ praviśati jānitavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3461: dāsyati eṣā ti / atha dāni parivarttiyāṇaṃ bhūyo nidhyāyati jānitavyaṃ / na
XXabhisdhu:3462: eṣā dāsyati gantavyaṃ / eṣā strī dhārāṃ vā pīṣayati / tilam vā / mudgam
XXabhisdhu:3463: vā kalāyām vā dalenti yadi (44a4) tāva śilāpūrakāṃ piṣiyāṇaṃ occarakaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3464: praviśati jānitavyaṃ / eṣā dāsyati / atha dāni parivarttiya nidhyāyati /
XXabhisdhu:3465: jānitavyaṃ / eṣā na dāsyatīti / eṣā strī karpāsaṃ kartteti yadi tāvantuka
XXabhisdhu:3466: nikṣipiyāṇaṃ uttheti / jānitavyaṃ / dāhiti eṣā nti(tti) / atha dāni bhūyo
XXabhisdhu:3467: prasārayati jānitavyaṃ / na dāhiti eṣā nti(tti) / eṣā strī upaviṣṭikā
XXabhisdhu:3468: ā(44a5)sati / bhikṣūna paśyiyāṇaṃ uttheti jānitavyaṃ / dāsyati eṣā nti(tti) /
XXabhisdhu:3469: atha dāni utthiyāṇaṃ bhūyo upaviśati jānitavyaṃ / na eṣā dāsyati / eṣā
XXabhisdhu:3470: strī bhikṣuṃ paśyiyāṇaṃ occarakaṃ praviśati jānitavyaṃ / dāsyati eṣā
XXabhisdhu:3471: nti(tti) / atha dāni riktā nirddhāvati / jānitavyaṃ / eṣā na dāsyati
XXabhisdhu:3472: gantavyaṃ / eṣā strī kāṃsabhājanaṃ mārjati bhikṣu paśyi(44a6)yāṇaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3473: (II.p.52) hastāṃ dhovati / jānitavyaṃ dāsyati eṣā tti / atha dāni ābharaṇāni
XXabhisdhu:3474: vā ucchāreti jānitavyaṃ / na eṣā dāsyatīti / mahātmanāṃ manuṣyāṇāṃ
XXabhisdhu:3475: gṛhā bhavanti / tahiṃ kuṇḍā ujjhitaprakīrṇṇā bhavanti / śāṭakā vā
XXabhisdhu:3476: paṭakā vā hārā vā arddhahārā vā hiraṇyaṃ vā suvarṇṇam vā na dāni
XXabhisdhu:3477: tahiṃ aśabdakarṇṇikāye nirggantavyaṃ / atha khalu prati(J.199)saṃviditena
XXabhisdhu:3478: nirggantavyaṃ / (44a7) evaṃ yaṃ yaṃ kārmmaṃ cchindiyāṇaṃ occarakaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3479: praviśati dātukāmā bhavati / na tena gantavyaṃ / evaṃ piṇḍāya caritavyaṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3482: bhagavān śrāvastyām viharati vistareṇa nidānaṃ kṛtvā te dāni
XXabhisdhu:3483: niśrayakaraṇīyā piṇḍāya caranti / teṣāṃ upādhyāyācāryā snehaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3484: sthapenti / khajjakhaṇḍakāni thapenti / paśyanti yaṃ kālam ā(44b1)gatā
XXabhisdhu:3485: bhavanti / tato teṣāṃ saṃvibhajiṣyāmaḥ / te pi dāni bāhyena bāhyaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3486: pratikramanti / te dāni teṣāṃ upādhyāyācāryā odhyāyanti vayaṃ yyeva
XXabhisdhu:3487: tāva imeṣāṃ kṛtena snehaṃ thapemaḥ / khajjakakhaṇḍakāni sthapemaḥ /

XXabhisdhu:3848: vā parimardditavyaṃ / atha dāni (na) pāreti vinodayituṃ / punaḥ punaḥ
XXabhisdhu:3849: khanati / ekatamaṃte gacchiya kaṇḍūyitavyaṃ / evaṃ kaṇḍūye (49a2)
XXabhisdhu:3853: bhagavān śrāvastyāṃ viharati / te dāni āyuṣmanto ṣaḍvarggikāḥ
XXabhisdhu:3855: bhañjayanti / paṭa-paṭāva phoḍenti / amaḍaṃ maḍamaḍaṃ yathā sīhā vā
XXabhisdhu:3856: vyāghrā vā / evaṃ jaṃbhayanti / yogācārāṃ bhikṣūn śabdena vyāvahanti /
XXabhisdhu:3858: bhagavān āha / tena hi evaṃ jambhayitavyaṃ / kin ti dāni evaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3859: jambhayitavyaṃ / nāyaṃ tāva kṣamati bhikṣuṇā prahāṇam upaviṣṭena
XXabhisdhu:3860: auddhatyābhiprāyeṇa osaritvā indriyāṇi maṭamaṭa aṅgā(ni) bhañjantena
XXabhisdhu:3861: yathā sīhena vā vyāghreṇa vā unnadantena evaṃ bhañjayitavyaṃ / atha
XXabhisdhu:3862: dāni bhikṣusya prahāṇam upaviṣṭasya vijṛmbhikā āgacchati / na dāni
XXabhisdhu:3863: aṃgāni ṭaṭṭa-ṭaṭṭa nti(tti) (49a4) phoṭantena (J.223) mukhaṃ vivaritvā
XXabhisdhu:3864: jambhayitavyaṃ / vinodetavyā nilalāṭam vā parimarditavyaṃ / nāsā vā
XXabhisdhu:3865: parimarditavyā atha dāni na pāreti vinodayituṃ / saṃprajānaṃ mukhaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3866: pithitvā jambhayitavyaṃ / tathā karttavyaṃ yathānantarikaṃ śabdena na
XXabhisdhu:3867: vyāvahati / atha dāni bhikṣusya vijṛmbhikā puno puno āgacchati
XXabhisdhu:3868: nirddhāviya vijṛmbhitavyaṃ / prahāṇasya vā āmantriya gantavyaṃ, / (49a5)
XXabhisdhu:3869: nāpi kṣamati prahāṇam upaviṣṭakena maṭa-maṭāya aṅgāni bhañjituṃ, /
XXabhisdhu:3870: atha dāni bhikṣusya aṅgāni duḥkhāyanti / ekā tāva bāhā sukhākaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3871: prasārayitavyā yaṃ kālaṃ viśrānto bhavati / (II.p.71) tāṃ sanmiñjiya
XXabhisdhu:3872: dvitīyā sukhākaṃ prasārayitavyā / eko pādo sukhākaṃ prasārayitavyo /
XXabhisdhu:3873: taṃ sanmiñjiya dvitīyo sukhākaṃ prasārayitavyo / na kṣamati bhikṣuṇā
XXabhisdhu:3874: bhaktāgre vā ta(49a6)rpaṇāgre vā sāmāyikaṃ vā dharmmaśravaṇe vā
XXabhisdhu:3875: aṅgāni bha(ṃ)jantena vijṛmbhayituṃ / atha dāni bhikṣusya vijṛmbhikā
XXabhisdhu:3876: āgacchati / yadi cīvaracīrṇṇa(koṇa)kena mukhaṃ pidhiya sukhākaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3877: vijṛmbhitavyaṃ / atha dāni bhikṣusya vijṛmbhikā puno puno āgacchati /
XXabhisdhu:3878: yadi tāva bhaktāgre vā upaviṣṭako bhavati / anantarikasya pātraṃ datvā
XXabhisdhu:3880: dharmmaśravaṇasya āmantri(49a7)ya gantavyaṃ / nāpi kṣamati bhikṣuṇā
XXabhisdhu:3882: maṭa-maṭāye aṅgāni bha(ṃ)jantena vijṛmbhituṃ / atha dāni bhikṣusya
XXabhisdhu:3883: bhūyo bhūyo vijṛmbhikā āgacchati cīvarakoṇena mukhaṃ pidhiya
XXabhisdhu:3884: saṃprajānena vijṛm[bhāyi]tavyaṃ / atha dāni bhikṣusya antaraghare vā
XXabhisdhu:3885: upaviṣṭasya puno puno vijṛmbhikā āgacchati / utthiya gantavyaṃ / na
XXabhisdhu:3887: maṭa-maṭāye aṃgāni bhaṃjantena vijṛmbhituṃ / atha dāni bhikṣusya
XXabhisdhu:3888: vijṛmbhikā āgacchati / ekamataṃ gatvā evaṃ vijṛmbhitavyaṃ / na

XXabhisdhu:3916: prahāṇaśālāṃ gacchiya caturddiśaṃ (49b6) niṣīdanti / yaṃ kālaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3917: bhikṣusaṃgho upaviṣṭo bhavati / eko tāva pūtivātakarmmaṃ karoti aparo
XXabhisdhu:3918: gacchanti / aparo ḍhara- (II.p.73)ḍha(ra) nti(tti) / (J.226) aparo āha / sādhv

XXabhisdhu:3921: paddamuṣṭikāṃ jighrāpenti / āha / jighrāyuṣman aho mṛṣṭo gandho aho

XXabhisdhu:3923: prakaraṇaṃ bhikṣū bhagavato ārocayeṃsu / (J.226.19) bhagavān āha /
XXabhisdhu:3925: bhagavān āha / tena hi evaṃ vātakarmme pratipadyitavyaṃ / kin ti dāni
XXabhisdhu:3926: evaṃ vātakarmme pratipadyita(vya)ṃ / nāyaṃ kṣamati / (J.226.19) bhikṣuṇā
XXabhisdhu:3927: auddhatyābhi(J.227)prāyeṇa śvetamayena kulmāṣān vā śaktukān vā
XXabhisdhu:3928: mardiyāṇaṃ ātape śoṣayitvā śveta(50a1)mayena yeva khādituṃ / nāpi
XXabhisdhu:3929: kṣamati / bilvāni vā madanaphalāni vā tatkālakāni phalāni khādituṃ /
XXabhisdhu:3930: kalāyaṃ vā satilapallavaṃ vā // atha dāni bhikṣu piṇḍacāram
XXabhisdhu:3932: śaktumardditakān labhati / vātakopakāni vā phalāni / kiñ cāpi khādeti /
XXabhisdhu:3933: anāpattiḥ / na kṣamati prahāṇam upaviṣṭena auddhatyābhiprāyeṇa vā
XXabhisdhu:3934: ḍhara-ḍha(50a2)rāye vāna(ta)karmma karttuḥ(ṃ,) / atha dāni bhikṣusya
XXabhisdhu:3935: prahāṇaśālāyām upaviṣṭasya vātakarmma āgaccati / na dāni osaritvā
XXabhisdhu:3936: indriyāni karttavyaṃ / atha dāni ārśavyādhiko bhavati / saṃprajāna ekaṃ
XXabhisdhu:3937: phiccakaṃ utkṣipiyāṇaṃ hastena vivaritvā vātakarmma (II.p.74) karttavyaṃ /

XXabhisdhu:3939: kṣamati / yena vṛddhatarako tena piccakam u(50a3)tkṣipituṃ / atha khalu
XXabhisdhu:3940: yena navakatarako tena phiccakam utkṣipitavyaṃ / atha dāni vṛddhatarako
XXabhisdhu:3941: ca navakatarako ca ekasthāne ḍhukkakaṃ bhavati / nāyaṃ kṣamati
XXabhisdhu:3942: saṃghanavakena yena saṃghasthaviro tena phiccakaṃ utkṣipituṃ, / kiñ cāpi
XXabhisdhu:3943: yena vṛddhatarako tena phiccakaṃ utkṣipati / anāpattiḥ / (J.227.16) atha
XXabhisdhu:3944: dāni bhikṣu na pāreti saṃprajāna vātakarmma (50a4) karttuṃ, /
